author: 3esmit
content:
<@!184800644266196992> very interesting this contract, did you see the decompiled source? https://etherscan.io/bytecode-decompiler?a=0xa619651c323923ecd5a8e5311771d57ac7e64d87
I wonder what are the incentives on setting and cleaning the storage slots on this contract... Maybe is some sort of signal?

author: 3esmit
content: Someone already used 217.59 Eth as gas in this

author: fabdarice
content: <@!551157969367334912> it appears to be an arbitrageur account. My guess is that he's calling this function everytime he needs to drop & replace a pending transaction that he's no longer interesting of executing (i.e: back-running tx that won't execute in time?)

author: kischiman
content:
Hey everyone! Hope it's not against the rules of this Discord. We’re running some user research on a (kick-ass) Layer 2 product on Monday, it's basically a website and we need some opinions of people who understand how ETH works.

If you have 30 minutes on Monday, would be awesome if you could sign up here:
https://calendly.com/deepwork-usertesting/deep-work-user-testing-layer2?month=2020-10
We'll show you our prototype and would love to hear your thoughts.

You will obviously be compensated with a 25$ amazon voucher.

Let me know if you’re interested, would be great!
